name: Loveverse: Episodes of Romance
description:
Your virtual love is now online!
Match up for a date right now!

Welcome to the world of Loveverse, you will fall in a variety of love experiences in this game! Thrilling, exciting, drama, or romantic, beyond your imagination!

Countless potential suitors are there waiting for you! Billionaire, mafia, president, military, even matched with werewolves or vampires!
Different characters with different personalities and backgrounds will bring you different kinds of relationships: romantic, sexy, adventurous, doggy, crazy ...... You'll never guess what surprises are waiting!

Collect sexy selfies from potential suitors, send cute or flirtatious emoji to increase each other's favor-ability, and possibly get a chance to meet and date, and influence the plot development and story ending through options to write your exclusive love story in the following three steps M-C-D.

-Match: Choose from many potential suitors and choose the one you can't stop chatting with.
-Chat: Dive in and start to making choices that affect your story line.
-Date: Date into the dating scene, experience the face-to-face relationship process, and write your own Loveverse chapter!

Download Loveverse now and receive a sign-up bonus!
Get your virtual love now!
